last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Marie tells Greg she wants the children back, the two go head to head in court. An epic, divisive custody battle exposes old wounds and digs into the truth of their marriage.

name: Come Home
overview: When mother Marie mysteriously leaves the family home, the repercussions are enormous.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When Marie mysteriously leaves home, the repercussions are enormous. But when secrets are revealed from the past, both Marie and her husband Greg realize they can’t just walk away from their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Single father Greg is reeling from his wife Marie mysteriously walking out on her family. He is torn between obsessing over his ex and courting disaster with a new love interest.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As Greg and Brenna settle into domesticity, Marie tries to navigate life without her kids. But as her world becomes increasingly turbulent, she is forced to face up to living a lie.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: When Marie tells Greg she wants the children back, the two go head to head in court. An epic, divisive custody battle exposes old wounds and digs into the truth of their marriage.

1.name: Season 1
